body: <div class="collapse-title font-semibold">How Do I Create An Account?<div>
<div class="collapse-content text-sm">Click The "Sign Up" Button In The Top Right Corner And Follow The Registration Process.<div>
<div class="collapse-title font-semibold">I Forgot My Password. What Should I Do?<div>
<div class="collapse-content text-sm">Click On "Forgot Password" On The Login Page And Follow The Instructions Sent To Your Email.<div>
<div class="collapse-title font-semibold">How Do I Update My Profile Information?<div>
<div class="collapse-content text-sm">Go To "My Account" Settings And Select "Edit Profile" To Make Changes.<div>
Accordion: Accordion Using Radio Inputs.description: daisyUI Accordion: Accordion Using Radio Inputs

body: The Apple Macintosh—Later Rebranded As The Macintosh 128K—Is The Original Apple Macintosh Personal Computer. It Played A Pivotal Role In Establishing Desktop Publishing As A Mainstream Office Function. Seeing A Commercial For It During Super Bowl Xviii From Apple Computer Inc. Was A Huge Deal.
Imac Is A Family Of All-In-One Macintosh Desktop Computers Designed And Built By Apple Inc. It Has Been The Primary Part Of Apple's Consumer Desktop Offerings Since Its Debut In August 1998.

The Ipod Is A Discontinued Series Of Portable Media Players And Multi-Purpose Mobile Devices Designed And Marketed By Apple Inc. The First Version Was Released On October 23, 2001, About 8+1⁄2 Months After The Macintosh Version Of Itunes Was Released.
Iphone Is A Line Of Smartphones Produced By Apple Inc. That Use Apple's Own Ios Mobile Operating System. The First-Generation Iphone Was Announced By Then-Apple Ceo Steve Jobs On January 9, 2007.

The Apple Watch Is A Line Of Smartwatches Produced By Apple Inc. It Incorporates Fitness Tracking, Health-Oriented Capabilities, And Wireless Telecommunication, And Integrates With Ios And Other Apple Products And Services.
